Adjective: very offensive in smell or taste
conspicuously and outrageously bad or reprehensible
complete and without restriction or qualification; sometimes used informally as intensifiers
Noun: a row or line of people (especially soldiers or polic)
the ordinary members of an organization (such as the enlisted soldiers of an arm)
the body of members of an organization or group
Verb: take or have a position relative to others
assign a rank or rating to
take precedence or surpass others in rank
